subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin, an N.F.L. head coach for more than a decade,  made his final public appearance before the Super Bowl, answering questions at the game’s final pregame news conference.
snippet: Giants Coach Tom Coughlin, an N.F.L. head coach for more than a decade,  made his final public appearance before the Super Bowl, answering questions at the game’s final pregame news conference.
